General.Name: Compal Broadband Networks Inc
General.Description: Compal Broadband Networks, Inc. provides networking, home security, home entertainment, and wireless accessories in Europe, the United States, Asia, and internationally. The company offers communication products, including smart gateways, set-top boxes, and wireless broadband routers. It also provides DOCSIS 3.1 CPE products, such as built-in WiFi 6 gateway and 2.5Gbps Ethernet to provide broadband cable services for DOCSIS user terminals; FTTx/PON products; routers; LTE/5G mobile communications peoducts comprising small base station, CBRS, LTE private networks, and LTE/5G user terminal equipment; and whole home mesh Wi-Fi products. The company was founded in 2009 and is based in Zhubei, Taiwan.
